ij.util

Class Java2

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.util.Java2

  • public class Java2
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods that use the Java 2 API. They are isolated here to prevent errors when ImageJ is running on Java 1.1 JVMs.

    • Constructor Summary
